description: Pale yellow, bell-shaped flowers with purple veins. The plant is 30 inches (75 cm) tall and has hairy leaves that are sticky to the touch.

Plants grow to 2 m (7 ft) tall with ovate leaves 18 cm (7 in) long. The bell-shaped flowers are dull purple with green tinges and faintly scented. The fruits are berries, which are green, ripening to a shiny black, and approximately 1.5 cm (0.6 in) in diameter.
This plant has a short stem bearing a tuft of ovate leaves. The flowers are solitary with a bell-shaped corolla of five purple petals. The fruit is a fleshy orange-coloured berry.
